review_blob: Found this on draft in Columbus. Incredibly balanced with a strong hop presence. Slightly sweet and citrusy with a bite that sticks around for a minute. One if my favorites.
This beer is amazing. Super happy in the nose.. Sweet citrusy body. Medium body and definitely one of my favorites.
beer_name: Avery The Maharaja Imperial India Pale Ale

review_blob: Light body but strong hop presence. Fairly sweet with notes of citrus. Finishes clean if not underwhelming.
beer_name: Four String Big Star White IPA

review_blob: Wow. Just wow. I had this on draft in a snifter. Body full of smoke and coffee. Very sweet finish.
beer_name: Left Hand Wake Up Dead Imperial Stout - Barrel-Aged

review_blob: Not my favorite back IPA (21st Amendment), but not bad. Nice dark roast with notes of coffee. Mouth feel is a bit weak and hop presence could use some work.
I was pleasantly surprised. Not terribly complex but I can appreciate well-executed simplicity. Light on the palate with apparent citrus and a slightly sweet aroma. Nice, clean finish.
beer_name: Harpoon The Long Thaw White IPA
